meanings.definition: A fight or quarrel between women that is characterized by petty or malicious behavior.
meanings.sent1: The catfights between the two girls were loud and unnecessary.
meanings.sent2: The gossip led to catfights among the classmates.
meanings.sent3: The catfights over who gets to sit in the front row were getting out of hand.
meanings.sent4: The catfights in the office were like a storm in a teacup.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the catfights lingered in the air long after they had ended.

meanings.sent1: She catfights with her sister whenever they disagree.
meanings.sent2: The two girls decided to catfight over a trivial matter.
meanings.sent3: The friends playfully catfought over the last slice of pizza.
meanings.sent4: He catfights with his best friend about sports teams all the time.
meanings.sent5: The siblings often catfight, but they always make up quickly.
